DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether there is a difference in executive function in learning in children with ADHD receiving medical treatment alone to the executive function in children receiving, in addition to medical treatment in learning strategies.
DOC.brief_title: Executive Function in Learning in Children With Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) Receiving Medical Treatment Alone Compared to Children Receiving Additional Treatment to Improve Learning Strategies
DOC.criteria: Normal development for age ADHD Low compliance Developmental delay Chronic disease
